business.headline: Mehli Mistry, Noel Tata lead race to become Tata Trusts chairman: ReportNoel Tata is already a trustee in the Sir Dorabji Tata Trust and the Sir Ratan Tata Trust, which together hold a 66% stake in Tata Sons, the holding company of the Tata Group.

Rupee falls to all-time low against dollar amid oil price surgeThe rupee weakened to 83.99 per dollar, slightly surpassing its previous all-time low of 83.9850 recorded on September 12, and down from the 83.9675 level seen in the prior trading session.

Murthy lauded Ratan Tata as a 'compassionate human being who transcended financial status and official power.'

Star Health confirms data breach, clears CISO of wrongdoing amid claimsStar Health Insurance released a statement acknowledging the cyberattack. The company confirmed that it was a victim of a targeted malicious cyberattack, which led to unauthorised access to certain data.

Remembering Ratan Tata, a beacon of philanthropyRatan Tata death: Ratan Tata played a key role with his philanthropic efforts in various sectors, including healthcare, technology, disaster relief and social welfare. Here's how Ratan Tata made a profound impact through his philanthropy.

Ratan Tata: The visionary who fuelled India's startup revolutionEven after his retirement, Ratan Tata continued to embody the spirit of entrepreneurship, emerging as a formidable investor and mentor to a multitude of startups across India.

TCS Q2 results today, press conference doubtful after Ratan Tata's demiseRatan Naval Tata, one of India's most influential industrialists and chairman emeritus of the Tata Group, passed away late Wednesday night at the age of 86.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Noel Tata appointed Chairman of Tata Trusts following Ratan Tata's demiseNoel Tata appointed chairman of Tata Trusts
Nayab Saini likely to take oath as Haryana Chief Minister on October 15Nayab Saini likely to take oath as Haryana Chief Minister on October 15

Akhilesh Yadav vs BJP over JP Narayan Centre and an appeal to Nitish KumarProtests by the Samajwadi Party erupted after Akhilesh Yadav claimed that the BJP installed tin sheets in front of JP Narayan Centre's main gate in Lucknow to prevent him from entering to mark the socialist leader's birth anniversary.

CCTV captures theft of Kali crown gifted by PM Modi to Bangladesh templeA crown gifted by Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi to the Jeshoreshwari Kali Temple in Satkhira in Bangladesh, has been stolen. The silver, gold-plated crown, presented during Modi's visit in 2021, was stolen on Thursday afternoon after the temple priest left following worship. CCTV footage captured a man stealing the crown.

Meanwhile, India has expressed its concern over the incident and urged the Bangladesh government to recover the stolen crown and bring the culprits to justice. Police said they are analysing the CCTV footage to identify the suspect.

Jigra review: Alia Bhatt's sparkle can't save this dull filmReleased-Fri Oct 11, 2024Alia Bhatt-starrer Jigra has promise, and the lead star shines brightest in the Vasan Bala directorial. However, the storyline leaves us wanting. Read the complete review of the film here.

Arvind Kejriwal's zinger as Donald Trump vows to slash energy costs by halfArvind Kejriwal drew a parallel between his own promise of freebies and a similar pledge made by former US President Donald Trump to make a point about the universal appeal of such subsidised services.

Delivery man killed after Audi rams his bike in Pune, driver detainedThe accident occurred in Pune when the Audi first hit three people riding an Activa, causing them to fall and sustain minor injuries. Shortly after, the luxury car rammed a biker, a Swiggy delivery agent, who later succumbed to his injuries.
Man arrested for molesting woman on Chennai-bound IndiGo flightA 45-year-old man was arrested for allegedly inappropriately touching a woman passenger while aboard a Chennai-bound IndiGo flight.

A tale of sugar and milk: How Parsis found a home in IndiaIn the 8th century, a group of Zoroastrians, fleeing persecution in Persia (modern-day Iran), arrived at the coast of Gujarat, seeking refuge. The Indian King of Sanjan allowed the strangers to stay on his land. The migrants promised to blend in, like sugar in milk, which has been the hallmark of their relationship with India.

Mahadev app kingpin arrested in Dubai, sources say extradition to India soonThe Mahadev app allegedly operated through a network of panel operators across India, facilitating money laundering from illegal betting activities. Chandrakar is also suspected of having links to the D Company.

The Kashmir story is much bigger than BJP's fortunesThe present and future of Kashmir matters more than the fortunes of political parties. That a free-and-fair election was held in Jammu and Kashmir and saw enthusiastic participation by the people is much more significant than the electoral outcome. This is why the process, and not its performance, should enthuse the BJP.

Goddess Kali's crown, gifted by PM, stolen from Bangladesh temple, India reactsThe silver, gold-plated crown was gifted to the goddess Kali at the Jeshoreshwari Temple in Satkhira by Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi in 2021 during his visit.

When PM brought Nano plant to Gujarat after 1 word SMS to Ratan Tata in 2008Then Gujarat Chief Minister Narendra Modi had sent a one word SMS to the then Tata Group Chairman Ratan Tata after the Nano project was withdrawn from West Bengal in 2008.

Bengaluru man threatens woman with acid attack for her choice of clothes, firedA Bengaluru man was sacked for his acid attack threat on a woman, an influencer, after he questioned her choice of clothes in a social media post.

Tesla Cybercab robotaxi revealed, to cost below $30,000Tesla revealed its fully autonomous driverless robotaxi, the Cybercab, on Friday.  Priced below $30,000, the Cybercab does not have a traditional charging port and will rely on wireless charging.

Coast Guard pilot's body found in Arabian Sea after month-long search The Indian Coast Guard and Navy had launched a massive search and rescue operation following the crash, but they were unable to locate Rana for over a month.

sports.headline: Rafael Nadal's retirement tough news for tennis world: Jannik SinnerJannik Sinner has claimed that the impending retirement of Rafael Nadal is tough news for the tennis world. Nadal will leave the sport at the end of the Davis Cup finals.

Pakistan hurt as a nation: Shan Masood slams bowling unit after Multan lossPakistan captain Shan Masood slammed his bowlers after their loss in Multan Test match. After hitting 556 runs in the first innings, Pakistan lost the match by an innings and 47 runs.

PAK vs ENG: Jack Leach takes a stunning catch to dismiss Shaheen AfridiJack Leach's brilliant caught-and-bowled dismissal of Shaheen Afridi capped a dominant performance as England secured a commanding victory over Pakistan by an innings and 47 runs in the first Test at Multan.

Multan Test: Ollie Pope credits Brook-Root and bowlers for historic winOllie Pope credited Joe Root-Harry Brook and the bowlers for their historic win in the Multan Test on October 11, Friday. England won the match by an innings and 47 runs despite conceding 556 runs upfront.

500-plus runs and still an innings defeat: PAK's historic low in Test cricketPAK vs ENG: Pakistan fell to yet another embarrassing loss in the Multan Test match. Pakistan became the first team in Test cricket who lost by an innings despite scoring 500 runs after batting first in the Test match.

No more unpredictable, Pakistan are becoming predictably poor PAK vs ENG: Shan Masood's Pakistan slumped to a defeat in the opening Test against England and are staring at another defeat in a home series. Pakistan are yet to win a home Test series since February 2021.

Thank you Rafael Nadal for teaching the world why it's important to not give upRafael Nadal's tennis career was defined by his warrior spirit, fighting every point as if it were life or death. His dominance on clay courts, particularly at Roland Garros with 14 French Open titles, was unmatched. Nadal's legacy will be remembered not just for his titles, but for his perseverance, humility, and the heart he poured into every match.

Gukesh has been in sensational form of late and recently guided India to their maiden Chess Olympiad victory.

Lionel Messi's return spoiled as Venezuela hold Argentina, Brazil edge past ChileLionel Messi's return to the Argentina team was spoiled by Venezuela, who held the World Champions to a 1-1 draw on October 10, Thursday. Brazil secured a last-gasp win to edge past Chile.

The India series will be Latham's first assignment as full-time Test captain.

Pakistan will try to beat Australia for Fatima Sana, her father: Muneeba AliWomen's T20 World Cup 2024: in the pre-match press conference, Muneeba Ali said that missing Fatima Sana would affect the team combination, but said that Pakistan would try and beat Australia and dedicate the win to Fatima and her father, who passed away recently.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.
